translation.en: but I was living in a United States that I didn't recognize.
translation.ko: 그런데 알고 보니 미국에 살면서도 여기가 어떤 나라인지 몰랐더군요

translation.en: I was afraid for my kids, for their future.
[crowd] Build that wall!
Build that wall!
Build that wall!
[crowd] No more walls!
This wall is just another way for him to try to divide the country.
translation.ko: 장벽은 이 나라를 분열시키려는 또 다른 수단입니다

translation.en: [Trump] They're bringing drugs.
They're bringing crime.
They're rapists.
This is a flat-out invasion.
Inside this old warehouse, the US Customs and Border Patrol
translation.ko: 이 낡은 창고 안에서 미국 세관과 국경 수비대가

translation.en: is keeping hundreds of immigrant children in cages
translation.ko: 철제 펜스로 케이지를 지어 수백 명에 달하는 이민자 아동을

translation.en: created by metal fencing.
The cages. The image of the cages for me…
I couldn't believe what I was watching.
[reporter] Every adult who comes into the country illegally
is sent to see a judge for possible prosecution.
And that is when the parent is separated from the child.
[Jennifer] You don't rip a child from their parents.
There's just certain things as a human being you don't do.
translation.ko: 인간으로서 해서는 안 되는 일들이 있어요

translation.en: What is my message, and what do I stand for?
translation.ko: 제가 어떤 메시지를 전하고 무엇을 상징해야 할까요?

translation.en: It made me realize that I have a responsibility to not be quiet,
translation.ko: 제가 침묵해서는 안 된다는 걸 깨달았어요

translation.en: to not… just leave the politics to everybody else.
translation.ko: 정치를 나 몰라라 하고 남들한테 떠넘기면 안 된다고요

translation.en: "This year's Super Bowl halftime show is a statement to a divided country,
translation.ko: '올해 슈퍼볼 하프타임 쇼는 분열된 국가를 향해서'

translation.en: declaring the importance of kindness, inclusivity, and compassion,
a reminder that we're always stronger, always better together."
translation.ko: '언제나 함께할수록 더 강하고 더 발전함을 상기시킬 것이다'

translation.en: "Shakira and Jennifer together for the first time in Miami
to craft a powerhouse performance that does just that."
translation.ko: '강렬한 합동 공연을 펼쳐 이 메시지를 전할 것이다'

translation.en: I told her to start thinking about what she wants that last song to be.
translation.ko: 샤키라한테 마지막 곡 생각해 보라고 했어요

translation.en: She wasn't crazy about "Born in the USA."
translation.ko: '본 인 더 USA'를 탐탁지 않아 했는데

translation.en: I'm not 100% convinced, so I couldn't convince her.
She's like, "I wasn't born in the USA."
I said, "Yeah, but everybody loves to sing that song."
And when America is at its best, everybody wants to live in America.
translation.ko: 미국이 최고의 상태일 때는 누구나 미국에서 살고 싶어 하고요

translation.en: You also have the right to come here because we're a country of immigrants.
translation.ko: 이민자의 나라니까 누구나 미국에 올 권리가 있어요

translation.en: That's who we are.
Bruce Springsteen, white American, saying to me…
♪ She was born in the-- ♪
And I was, and I'm Latin.
That's… that's big. That's big.
Because these motherfuckers act like everybody's an immigrant
translation.ko: 개자식들이 라틴계라면 다 이민자인 줄 알아요

translation.en: who's trying to sneak into the country and who's a criminal.
translation.ko: 미국에 몰래 기어들어 오려는 범죄자로 취급하잖아요

translation.en: 'Cause that's the narrative Trump created, which is bullshit.
Some of us have been here for years.
A lot of those people are just good people who are looking for the American dream.
translation.ko: 아메리칸드림을 꿈꾸는 선한 사람이 대부분인데도 그래요

translation.en: That's all they want.
But like I told her, I said if you come up with a better song and a better cameo
translation.ko: 샤키라한테 더 좋은 곡이나 카메오 생각나면 말하라고 했어요

translation.en: to make the statement that we shouldn't be hating on each other…
translation.ko: 서로를 혐오해서는 안 된다는 메시지를 잘 전달할 수 있다면요

translation.en: -[man] Yeah, the statement's ready. -…that's the statement.
translation.ko: - 바로 그거예요 - 그 말을 해야 해요

translation.en: -[Elaine] Mm-hmm. -That's the statement.
My parents came from Puerto Rico to New York when they were just kids.
translation.ko: 저희 부모님은 아주 어렸을 때 푸에르토리코에서 뉴욕으로 오셨죠

translation.en: Everybody thought there was a better life here.
translation.ko: 그때는 모두 미국에만 오면 삶이 나아질 거라고 믿었어요

translation.en: Just… get on a train and come down here with all my big dreams
translation.ko: "브롱크스" 가슴에 큰 꿈을 품고 열차를 타고 왔어요

translation.en: and just… try to make 'em come true.
translation.ko: 가슴에 큰 꿈을 품고 열차를 타고 왔어요 꿈을 이루려고요

translation.en: Having the upbringing I had, not growing up, like, around the business,
translation.ko: 저는 일자리가 없는 곳에서 어린 시절을 보냈어요

translation.en: I know what it is to get up and, you know, get on a train and work hard.
translation.ko: 이른 아침 일어나 열차를 타고 가 열심히 일하는 삶이 어떤지 알죠

translation.en: Coming from the Latino community
and coming from nothing,
we've had to push harder than the normal person.
We've had to work harder. We have to prove ourselves over and over.
translation.ko: 일도 더 열심히 하고 스스로 끊임없이 증명해야 했죠

translation.en: -Happy Thanksgiving. -Morning. Happy Thanksgiving.
translation.ko: - 즐거운 추수 감사절 보내세요 - 좋은 아침이에요, 제니퍼도요

translation.en: -I'm good. How are you? -Happy Thanksgiving.
translation.ko: - 잘 지냈어요? - 추수 감사절 잘 보내요

translation.en: [man] On the bottom.
Linda!
Do something with your dog… that you didn't tell me you were bringing.
translation.ko: 네 강아지 좀 어떻게 해봐 데려온다는 말 없었잖아

translation.en: I'm the one who does the stuffing. Uh…
translation.ko: 매년 제가 칠면조 속을 만들죠 "루페 로드리게스 어머니"

translation.en: My ex-husband always did the turkey.
I figure about 48 years. I'm doing the same turkey all this time, so…
translation.ko: 48년쯤 됐을 거예요 늘 같은 방식으로 굽죠 "데이비드 로페즈 아버지"

translation.en: Me and my dad usually cook Thanksgiving dinner.
translation.ko: 추수 감사절 저녁 식사는 보통 저랑 아빠가 맡아요

translation.en: -[Lupe] I taught them how to do it. -My mom doesn't like to cook.
translation.ko: 내가 가르쳐 준 거잖니 엄마는 요리를 안 좋아하세요

translation.en: [Lupe] Hey, I need to taste that to see if it's good.
-[Jennifer] Let me mix this some more. -It's good. It's good.
translation.ko: - 이것 좀 더 섞어야 해요 - 잘됐어

translation.en: Take a potato.
Too vinegary.
-No. -Yeah.
-No. -Yes, baby.
No. It's delicious.
[in Spanish] Too much vinegar.
[in English] Too much vinegar. How ironic.
Growing up,
I was surrounded by strong,
powerful,
tough women.
My mom and my grandmother and my aunt, they ran shit. That was it.
translation.ko: 엄마, 할머니, 이모 세 분이 모든 걸 휘어잡고 사셨죠

translation.en: They just… they were in charge.
translation.ko: 세 분이 모든 걸 휘어잡고 사셨죠

translation.en: [Lupe] David and I moved to the Bronx.
It was a fourth-floor walk-up,
and it only had one bedroom.
I had my three daughters in that apartment.
My mom, she's a super complicated person, and she carries a lot of baggage.
translation.ko: 저희 엄마는 참 복잡하고 응어리가 많은 분이세요

translation.en: Her generation was,
"A man will come along and marry you and take care of you
for the rest of your life and provide for you."
And she had a lot bigger dreams than that.
translation.ko: 하지만 엄마는 그보다 큰 꿈을 꿨어요

translation.en: She dreamt of being an actress.
She wanted us to be independent.
Like, "I don't want you guys to ever have to depend on a man for anything."
translation.ko: 뭔가를 얻기 위해서 남자한테 의지하지 않길 바라셨죠

translation.en: I always had the highest expectations of them. It wasn't to be critical.
translation.ko: 딸들한테 늘 기대가 컸는데 다그치려던 건 아니었어요

translation.en: It was just to show you that you could do better.
translation.ko: 더 잘할 수 있단 걸 보여주고 싶었어요

translation.en: And Jennifer, she gave me the hardest time, tell you the truth.
translation.ko: 솔직히 제니퍼 키우는 게 제일 힘들었어요

translation.en: You know, we butted heads a lot.
[Jennifer] She did what she had to do to survive,
translation.ko: 엄마는 살아남기 위해서 해야 하는 일을 하셨고

translation.en: and it made her strong,
but it also made her tough.
She beat the shit out of us.
[Lupe] I was far from the perfect mother, but the one thing I can always say,
translation.ko: 제가 완벽한 엄마랑은 거리가 멀죠 하지만 이것만은 확신할 수 있어요

translation.en: everything I did, I did with their best interest at heart.
translation.ko: 제가 한 모든 일은 진심으로 딸들을 위한 거였어요

translation.en: Everybody sit. Everybody sit anywhere you want.
[Lupe] I'm glad that she's strong and tough
because you have to be to survive in this business.
I'm really grateful for my mom and dad because they taught me to do everything on my own.
translation.ko: 엄마랑 아빠한테 정말 감사해요 뭐든 스스로 하라고 가르치셨죠

translation.en: And I live with those voices in my head.
As a young performer,
every job that I got I did
because there were so many in between that I didn't get.
translation.ko: 할 수 있는 일이 많지 않아서요

translation.en: Good roles for women of color were very limited,
translation.ko: 유색 인종 여성은 좋은 역할을 따내기 어려웠어요

translation.en: but I just kept grinding and believing
translation.ko: 그렇지만 언젠가 어떤 식으로든 기회가 올 거라고 믿으면서

translation.en: that somehow, someway, I would get that shot.
translation.ko: 그렇지만 언젠가 어떤 식으로든 기회가 올 거라고 믿으면서 끊임없이 노력했죠

translation.en: [man] I'd like to thank all of you for coming here.
This is a really extraordinary event.
Uh, I have the great pleasure of introducing to you Jennifer Lopez.
translation.ko: 여러분께 기쁜 마음으로 제니퍼 로페즈를 소개합니다

translation.en: [photographer] Jennifer!
[Jennifer] Selena was a Tejano singer and a beloved artist
translation.ko: 셀레나는 테하노 가수이자 모두에게 사랑받는 아티스트고 무대를 휘어잡는 슈퍼스타였죠

translation.en: with an amazing stage presence of a superstar.
translation.ko: 모두에게 사랑받는 아티스트고 무대를 휘어잡는 슈퍼스타였죠

translation.en: And, unfortunately, at 23 years old,
she was gunned down by the head of her fan club.
translation.ko: 팬클럽 회장이 쏜 총에 맞아 세상을 떠났어요

translation.en: It's important to the Latino community because we haven't had
translation.ko: 라틴계 커뮤니티에서 참 중요한 인물이에요 최초로 할리우드에서 성공한 롤 모델이니까요

translation.en: any big role models in Hollywood.
Not huge that have crossed such barriers like she did in our Latin community.
translation.ko: 셀레나처럼 많은 장벽을 넘어 대성공을 이룬 사람은 없었죠

translation.en: [man] Selena, it's a very entertaining and moving film,
helped by a luminous performance by Jennifer Lopez
who shows an onstage exuberance that quickly wins her lots of fans.
translation.ko: 무대 위에서의 열정적인 모습으로 팬들의 마음을 단숨에 사로잡았죠

translation.en: You're not. Do you know who you are?
I can see you.
You're just Chris.
You say it's star-making. It may well be. She is absolutely enchanting in this role.
translation.ko: 이 영화가 스타를 낳은 것도 맞죠 제니퍼가 캐릭터를 잘 살렸어요

translation.en: [interviewer] You have broken the financial barrier for Latina actresses.
translation.ko: 금전적인 측면에서 라틴계 여배우의 한계를 넘었어요

translation.en: You're making a million dollars a picture, breaking a cultural barrier in Hollywood.
translation.ko: 영화가 백만 달러 수익을 내면서 할리우드의 문화적 장벽을 부쉈죠

translation.en: That's a big deal.
I know. It's a huge deal. I feel like I struck oil this year. [laughs]
Remember how talkative you were in the trunk?
translation.ko: 우리 트렁크에서 수다 떨었던 거 기억나?

translation.en: Adele said you do that when you're nervous.
translation.ko: 당신 긴장하면 말 많아진다고 아델한테 들었거든

translation.en: Oh, she did, did she?
[Jennifer, in character] You kept touching me, feeling my thigh.
translation.ko: 당신은 계속 날 만지고 내 허벅지를 더듬었지

translation.en: Jennifer Lopez. That's what we've got. That's what makes it sizzle, Jennifer.
translation.ko: 제니퍼 로페즈가 큰 역할을 했죠 제니퍼 덕분에 영화가 빛났어요

translation.en: [Jennifer] My idea of success is always evolving,
always getting a little outside your comfort zone
translation.ko: 항상 안주하지 않고 한 발짝 더 나아가는 거죠

translation.en: and doing something different.
I'm working on my album right now.
-[host] Excuse me? -Yeah.
-Casually mention that. You have an album? -Yeah.
-Can you… can you do both? -I'm gonna try to balance them both…
translation.ko: - 둘 다 할 수 있겠어요? - 균형을 잘 잡아보려고…

translation.en: She always had a great passion for singing.
translation.ko: 항상 노래에 대한 강렬한 열정이 있었죠

translation.en: And after Selena, she wanted to make music.
I was like, why… why can't we do the things?
Why can't we do all the things? [laughs]
[Benny] We were determined to seize the opportunities
that were presenting themselves.
[Benny] She was nonstop.
Did you have a plan that it would be on this magnitude?
I mean, number one album as well as number one movie.
[Elaine] She's a dancer,
who became an actor,
who became a singer,
who became a global icon.
She's a woman of color
who had the audacity to pursue her dreams.
translation.ko: 자신의 꿈을 향해 달리는 대담함을 지녔어요

translation.en: [reporter 1] In these trying economic times, Jennifer Lopez has taken the art of diva
translation.ko: 극심한 경기 침체 속에서 제니퍼 로페즈는 디바로서

translation.en: to new heights.
[host] J.Lo from the block. Jenny from the block.
Sister needs to keep it real, and she's no longer keeping it real.
translation.ko: 여자라면 자제할 줄 알아야죠 제니퍼는 정도를 모르네요

translation.en: [reporter 2] The revolving door that is Jennifer Lopez's love life.
translation.ko: 제니퍼 로페즈의 연애사를 보면 회전문이 떠오르죠

translation.en: [reporter 3] Hollywood's best known serial bride is at it again.
translation.ko: 할리우드에서 가장 여러 번 결혼한 제니퍼가 또 활동을 시작했습니다

translation.en: She was a name that could sell papers, that could sell magazines.
translation.ko: 제니퍼의 이름을 쓰기만 하면 신문과 잡지가 불티나게 팔렸죠

translation.en: [reporter 4] What accounts for her roller-coaster history with guys?
translation.ko: 남성 편력이 참 화려한데 과연 그 이유가 뭘까요?

translation.en: [Jennifer] No matter what I achieved, their appetite to cover my personal life
translation.ko: 제가 뭘 해냈든 간에 언론에선 제 사생활을 다뤘어요

translation.en: overshadowed everything that was happening in my career.
translation.ko: 제가 어떤 경력을 쌓고 있는지는 그늘에 가려서 보이지도 않았죠

translation.en: I just had a very low self-esteem.
I really believed a lot of what they said, which is I wasn't any good.
translation.ko: 저더러 한물갔다고들 했는데 그 말을 진심으로 믿었어요

translation.en: That I wasn't a good singer, I wasn't a good actress,
I wasn't a good dancer, I wasn't good at anything.
I just didn't even belong here. Why wouldn't I just go away?
translation.ko: 전 할리우드에 어울리지 않으니 그냥 사라져 버릴까도 싶었어요

translation.en: I feel like I was in this, like, really abusive dysfunctional relationship.
translation.ko: 아주 폭력적이고 문제가 많은 연애를 했던 것 같아요

translation.en: When you're with a guy who tells you, "No, you suck,
translation.ko: 애인이 계속 이러는 거예요 '너는 형편없어 아무것도 할 줄 모르고 엉망이야'

translation.en: you're not good, you're dah, dah, dah," you feel you have no worth and value.
translation.ko: '너는 형편없어 아무것도 할 줄 모르고 엉망이야' 그럼 내가 가치 없게 느껴져요

translation.en: If I was in front of Jennifer Lopez and she said, "You can't sing,"
translation.ko: 제니퍼 로페즈가 제 면전에서 노래 못한다고 까면 이럴 거예요

translation.en: I'd go, "Neither can you!"
♪ Burrito, taco, taco! ♪
♪ Burrito, taco, taco, taco! ♪
♪ Don't think just because I got a lot of money ♪
translation.ko: 나 돈 많으니까 아무 생각 말고 즐겨

translation.en: ♪ I'll give you Taco-flavored kisses, honey ♪
We regret to inform you that, uh, we're dropping you from the label.
What? Oh no, you di'in't.
We want to thank you for all your hard work and "talent."
[man] I said to her once, "Doesn't this bother you?"
translation.ko: 이렇게 물어본 적 있어요 '진짜 지긋지긋하지 않아?'

translation.en: And she said, "I'm Latina. I'm a woman."
"I… I expected this. You just don't expect it."
translation.ko: "벤 애플렉" '당신은 생각 못 했겠지만 난 이렇게 될 줄 알았어'

translation.en: "You expect to be treated fairly."
Here to apologize on their behalf are our script intern, Elon,
translation.ko: 우리 쇼의 인턴 작가 일론이 두 사람을 대신해 사과하겠답니다

translation.en: who kind of looks like Ben Affleck, and our resident J.Lo, cleaning lady,
translation.ko: 벤 애플렉이랑 꽤 닮았거든요 우리의 청소원 제이로도 왔죠

translation.en: Judy Lowenstein.
[Jennifer] There was many times where I was just, like,
translation.ko: "하녀는 아내는커녕 친구로도 삼지 마라" 여러 번 생각했어요

translation.en: "I just… I think I'm just gonna quit."
I had to… really figure out who I was
translation.ko: 그때 저는… 저 자신이 누구인지 알아야 했어요

translation.en: and believe in that and not believe anything else.
translation.ko: 제가 누구인지를 굳게 믿고 남의 말은 듣지 말아야 했죠

translation.en: [reporter] Jennifer Lopez might be nominated as best actress.
translation.ko: 제니퍼 로페즈가 여우조연상 후보로 거론되고 있다고 합니다

translation.en: And the reason that this is news is because, rather cruelly,

translation.en: to put this together.
You know, lighting, the cameramen, so many moving parts.
translation.ko: 조명과 카메라맨을 포함해서 이동하는 장비가 많을 거예요

translation.en: Now get out there. Move out. All clear.
Line it up, guys. Line it up. Line it up.
[Jennifer] We left rehearsal,
and I… I noticed everybody's kinda freaking out, but I don't know why.
translation.ko: 다들 사색이 돼 있던데 저는 이유를 몰랐어요

translation.en: And I get a call
from Benny,
and he's like, "They wanna pull the cages."
That night, the higher-ups at the NFL saw it for the first time,
translation.ko: 그날 밤 NFL 고위 관계자들이 케이지를 처음 보고 이랬대요

translation.en: and they're like, "Hey, you can't do that."
translation.ko: 그날 밤 NFL 고위 관계자들이 케이지를 처음 보고 이랬대요 '이봐요, 케이지는 안 돼요'

translation.en: The NFL had a real concern about making a political statement
translation.ko: NFL 측에선 이민에 대해 정치적 입장을 드러내는 것을 우려했어요

translation.en: about immigration.
They looked at the plans, and the message was absolute.
translation.ko: 공연 계획을 살펴봤더니 메시지가 확실했던 거죠

translation.en: They did not want those cages in the show.
That had come down from the highest authority.
Highest authority.
[Jennifer] For me, this isn't about politics.
This is about human rights.
I'm facing the biggest crossroads of my life, you know,
to be able to perform on the world's biggest stage.
translation.ko: 세계 최대의 무대에서 공연할 기회를 얻었죠

translation.en: But to take out the cages and sacrifice what I believe in
translation.ko: 하지만 케이지를 없애고 제 믿음을 저버린다면

translation.en: would be like never being there at all.
There was a part of me that just got very zen, and I was like,
"Benny, I don't care what you have to do. We're not changing the show."
translation.ko: '베니, 그쪽 입장은 모르겠고요 이제 와서 쇼를 바꿀 순 없어요'

translation.en: The Super Bowl is tomorrow, and we're not changing anything.
I've been thinking about the Super Bowl
probably since I started recording records in 1999.
translation.ko: 1999년에 첫 음반을 녹음한 후로 쭉 그랬던 것 같아요

translation.en: As challenging as this has been
and different than what I thought it was gonna be,
Parris said, in one of the rehearsals, it takes you through a gamut of emotions.
translation.ko: 한번은 패리스가 리허설 중에 온갖 감정이 다 든다고 했어요

translation.en: It takes you on a high-energy, beautiful ride
where you feel so many things.
Parris, she's a perfectionist,
but I think every single one of you right now is a better dancer because of her.
translation.ko: 패리스 덕분에 모두 댄서로서 성장했을 거예요

translation.en: -[dancers] Parris! -[group cheering, applauding]
Other person who's like that is Tabitha, which is why she's been with me forever.
translation.ko: 타비사도 그런 사람이라서 저랑 영원히 함께하고 있죠

translation.en: Forever.
[Jennifer] Just like a lot of you here.
I know some of you I didn't know very well.
It takes a while to warm up to me,

translation.en: but I… I love you, and I feel you deeply.

every single time you're out there.
[tearfully] I'm sorry. For being…
[in Spanish] Being Latino in this country

My family means a lot to me.
And representing Latinos to the world,
translation.ko: 전 세계 사람 앞에서 라틴계를 대표하는 것

translation.en: I know that's something that I do.
Something that God has blessed me to do.
There are many Latinos in this country, and they are not being treated well,
translation.ko: 이 나라에는 라틴계가 많은데 제대로 대우받고 있지 못해요

translation.en: and that's why this show is so important.
translation.ko: 그래서 이 쇼가 중요한 것 같아요

translation.ko: "슈퍼볼을 거머쥔 제니퍼 로페즈 오스카는 필요 없다"

translation.ko: "TV에 방영된 하프타임 쇼 중 NFL 유튜브 채널 조회 수 1위"

translation.en: and recognizing that we are part of the fabric of this country.
translation.ko: 우리도 이 나라의 일부라는 걸 알아주는군요

kept it together…
…all this time.
[group chants] J.Lo! J.Lo! J.Lo! J.Lo!
J.Lo! J.Lo! J.Lo!
[Jennifer] I don't think I could have done this Super Bowl

I didn't understand myself.
I was finding my way.
[Jennifer] There's so much more exciting stuff coming, and… and I'm ready for it now.
translation.ko: 훨씬 더 흥미진진한 일들이 앞으로 펼쳐질 텐데 준비됐어요

translation.en: And I'm actually thriving
in a way that I never could have imagined that I would be at this time in my life.
translation.ko: 이 나이에 이런 식으로 일이 잘 풀리리라곤 생각 못 했죠

translation.en: It felt like flying.
Every time I did a rehearsal, it was so hard.
It was hard.
But my adrenaline must have been at 150 because honestly, I felt like a feather.
translation.ko: 아드레날린 150은 찍었을 거예요 오늘은 몸이 날개처럼 가벼웠어요

So much more I wanna say.
I'm not done.
Not even close.
